\documentclass[$fontsize$]{article}

\usepackage[$paper$, margin=$margin$in]{geometry}

$if(pdflatex)$
  \usepackage[protrusion=true,expansion=true]{microtype}
$endif$

\usepackage[colorlinks]{hyperref}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\usepackage{framed}
\usepackage{fancyvrb}
\usepackage{color}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{colorlinks = true, allcolors = blue}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{flafter}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{multirow}

$if(linespacing)$
  \usepackage{setspace}
  % custom spacing for paragraphs
  \setstretch{$linespacing$}

  % set spacing 1.0 for tables and code
  \AtBeginEnvironment{tabular}{\singlespacing}
  \AtBeginEnvironment{table}{\singlespacing}
  \AtBeginEnvironment{longtable}{\singlespacing}
  \AtBeginEnvironment{verbatim}{\singlespacing}
  \AtBeginEnvironment{Shaded}{\singlespacing}
$endif$

% texlive >= 2020
$if(csl-refs)$
\newlength{\cslhangindent}
\setlength{\cslhangindent}{1.5em}
\newenvironment{CSLReferences}[2]
  {$if(csl-hanging-indent)$\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
  \everypar{\setlength{\hangindent}{\cslhangindent}}\ignorespaces$endif$}
  {\par}
$endif$

$if(customfonts)$
  \usepackage[mathlf,textlf,minionint,openg]{MinionPro}
  % the pkg was renamed
  \usepackage[cal=boondoxo,bb=lucida,bbscaled=.9]{mathalpha}
$else$
  \usepackage{amsmath}
  \usepackage{amssymb}
$endif$

$if(amsthm)$
  \usepackage{amsthm}
$endif$

% set text colour to #2c2e35
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{dark}{HTML}{2c2e35}
\color{dark}

% set link colour to #1e3765
\definecolor{myblue}{HTML}{1e3765}
\hypersetup{colorlinks,linkcolor=myblue,urlcolor=myblue}

$if(sansserif)$
\usepackage{sansmath}
\renewcommand{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}
\sansmath
$endif$

$if(creativecommons)$
  \usepackage{hyperxmp}
  \usepackage[type={CC}, modifier={$creativecommons$}, version={4.0}]{doclicense}
$endif$

\makeindex

\providecommand{\tightlist}{\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

% To pass between YAML and LaTeX the dollar signs are added by CII
% Syntax highlighting #22
$if(highlighting-macros)$
  $highlighting-macros$
$endif$

\author{$author$\\$department$, $university$}
\title{$title$}
\date{$date$}

\setlength\parindent{0pt}
\setlength\parskip{2pt}

% Change the university
\newcommand{\university}{$university$}
% Change the department
\newcommand{\department}{$department$}

\begin{document}

\maketitle

$if(creativecommons)$
\doclicenseThis
$endif$

\thispagestyle{empty}
$if(outline)$
\tableofcontents
$endif$
\setcounter{page}{0}
\clearpage

$body$

% Index?
% \printindex

\end{document}
